text: Eduardo Ferreira dos Santos, more commonly known as Eduardo Mancha is a Brazilian football defender, who currently plays for Machine Sazi in the Persian Gulf Pro League. ==Club career== ===Machine Sazi=== He made his debut for Machine Sazi in first fixtures of 2019–20 Iran Pro League against Esteghlal. ==References== Category:1995 births Category:Living people Category:Brazilian footballers Category:Persian Gulf Pro League players Category:Brazilian expatriate sportspeople in Iran Category:Expatriate footballers in Iran Category:Brazilian expatriate footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:Machine Sazi F.C. players
title: Eduardo Mancha
